column5: Welcome to The Comfy Cozy World Travel Room w/ the traveler in mind, feel very relaxed in Rm 2, geared towards business,vacation simply a visit to Texas a desk with a comfortable chair RM # 2 has plenty of sunlight and nice big windows and are very clean and well organized with you in mind.
